com.digi.xbee.api.models

Class XBeePacketsQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digi.xbee.api.models.XBeePacketsQueue

  • public class XBeePacketsQueue
extends Object
    This class represents a queue of XBee packets used for sequential packets reading within the XBee Java API.

    The class provides some methods to get specific packet types from different source nodes.

    See Also:
    XBeePacket

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_MAX_LENGTH
      Default maximum number of packets to store in the queue (value: 50).

        Throws:

    • Method Detail

      • addPacket

        public void addPacket(XBeePacket xbeePacket)
        Adds the provided packet to the list of packets. If the queue is full the first packet will be discarded to add the given one.
        Parameters:
        xbeePacket - The XBee packet to be added to the list.
        See Also:
        XBeePacket

      • clearQueue

        public void clearQueue()
        Clears the list of packets.

      • getCurrentSize

        public int getCurrentSize()
        Returns the current size of the XBee packets queue.
        Returns:
        The current size of the XBee packets queue.

      • getFirstDataPacket

        public XBeePacket getFirstDataPacket(int timeout)
        Returns the first data packet from the queue waiting up to the specified timeout if necessary for an XBee data packet to become available. null if the queue is empty or there is not any data packet inside.
        Parameters:
        timeout - The time in milliseconds to wait for an XBee data packet to become available. 0 to return immediately.
        Returns:
        The first data packet from the queue, null if it is empty or no data packets are contained in the queue.
        See Also:
        XBeePacket

      • getFirstDataPacketFrom

        public XBeePacket getFirstDataPacketFrom(RemoteXBeeDevice remoteXBeeDevice,
                                         int timeout)
        Returns the first data packet from the queue whose 64-bit source address matches the address of the provided remote XBee device.

        The methods waits up to the specified timeout if necessary for an XBee data packet to become available. null if the queue is empty or there is not any XBee data packet sent by the provided remote XBee device.

        Parameters:
        remoteXBeeDevice - The XBee device containing the 64-bit address to look for in the list of packets.
        timeout - The time in milliseconds to wait for an XBee data packet from the specified remote XBee device to become available. 0 to return immediately.
        Returns:
        The first XBee data packet whose its 64-bit address matches the address of the provided remote XBee device. null if no data packets from the specified XBee device are found in the queue.
        See Also:
        RemoteXBeeDevice, XBeePacket

      • getFirstPacket

        public XBeePacket getFirstPacket(int timeout)
        Returns the first packet from the queue waiting up to the specified timeout if necessary for an XBee packet to become available. null if the queue is empty.
        Parameters:
        timeout - The time in milliseconds to wait for an XBee packet to become available. 0 to return immediately.
        Returns:
        The first packet from the queue, null if it is empty.
        See Also:
        XBeePacket

      • getFirstPacketFrom

        public XBeePacket getFirstPacketFrom(RemoteXBeeDevice remoteXBeeDevice,
                                     int timeout)
        Returns the first packet from the queue whose 64-bit source address matches the address of the provided remote XBee device.

        The methods waits up to the specified timeout if necessary for an XBee packet to become available. Null if the queue is empty or there is not any XBee packet sent by the provided remote XBee device.

        Parameters:
        remoteXBeeDevice - The remote XBee device containing the 64-bit address to look for in the list of packets.
        timeout - The time in milliseconds to wait for an XBee packet from the specified remote XBee device to become available. 0 to return immediately.
        Returns:
        The first XBee packet whose 64-bit address matches the address of the provided remote XBee device. null if no packets from the specified XBee device are found in the queue.
        See Also:
        RemoteXBeeDevice, XBeePacket

      • getMaxSize

        public int getMaxSize()
        Returns the maximum size of the XBee packets queue.
        Returns:
        The maximum size of the XBee packets queue.
